definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: A wooden passenger car was abandoned at back yard of Wu-Shu-Lin Depot.
sentences.chinese: 废弃于乌树林车库后方的糖铁木制客车。

sentences.english: Plastic plates and cups also make up 0.5 percent of our trash every year (PDF), and those products induce plenty of environmental agita.
sentences.chinese: 每年废弃的胶杯和胶碟也在垃圾中占据0。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the preparation of activated carbon with Macadamia shell.
sentences.chinese: 研究以废弃澳洲坚果壳为原料的活性炭制备。

sentences.english: Granny grudged to part with anything, including the disused.
sentences.chinese: 也许这个词已经废弃不用了吧。

sentences.english: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
sentences.chinese: 你是废弃敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

sentences.english: Algae feed on the nitrogen-rich waste products generated by the embryos.
sentences.chinese: 藻类以胚胎产生的富含氮的废弃物受益。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the solid by-products, rich in energy, could be incinerated as well.
sentences.chinese: 同样，富含能量的固体废弃物可焚烧发电。

sentences.english: Devices fall out of favor, but seldom if ever get abolished by design.
sentences.chinese: 设备被完全废置很少见，即使在设计上完全废弃。

sentences.english: An abandoned military road, overgrown with weeds, marked the former boundary line.
sentences.chinese: 一条长满野草的废弃军用公路标示出以前的边界线。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the treatment approach and the main safety measures of open-air abandoned mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了露天废弃矿山治理方式及主要安全措施。

sentences.english: The abandoned tea boxes can be transformed into very fine jewelry boxes.
sentences.chinese: 废弃的茶叶盒可以变身精美的首饰盒。

sentences.english: The aspect and slope of wasteland are important factors affecting plant colonization.
sentences.chinese: 废弃地的坡向和坡度也是影响植物定居的重要因子。

sentences.english: And China already bans the export of used computer motherboards and other discarded electronics parts.
sentences.chinese: 而中国已经禁止出口旧电脑主板和其他废弃电子元件。

sentences.english: The police found the lost treasure in an abandoned well.
sentences.chinese: 警察在一口废弃的井里找到了丢失的财宝。

sentences.english: They are the points at which our physical waste is excreted from our body.
sentences.chinese: 它们是一个我们和我们身体废弃物的分离点。

sentences.english: Disassembly of wornout or malfunctioning products is a principal matter during the green remanufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 废弃产品的拆卸回收是绿色再制造的中心问题。

definition: to abandon/to let go to waste
old and in a state of disrepair (idiom)/dilapidated
to tear down/to demolish/to dismantle/to remove
